job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} setenv STARFPE NO setenv NODEBUG yes setup 64b starver TFG18c set filelist = `cat $FILELIST | awk '{print $1}'` echo "file list = ${filelist}" set NL = `echo ${filelist} | wc -l` echo "NL = ${NL}" if (${NL} == 0) exit 0; foreach input ( ${filelist} ) echo ${input} | grep ':' if (! $?) then set dir = `echo ${input} | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` set tag = `echo ${input} | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` else set dir = `dirname ${input}`; set tag = `basename ${input} .picoDst.root`; endif set log = ${tag}B.log # if (-r ${log}) exit 0; if (! -r "${tag}.femtoDst.root") then # root.exe -q -b -x 'femtoDst.C(1e8,"'${dir}'/'${tag}'/*'${tag}'*.picoDst.root")' >& ${log} root.exe -q -b -x 'femtoDst.C(1e8,"'${dir}'/'${tag}'.picoDst.root")' >& ${log} endif end
